maqras.text: 82|1|nowpel del mekh ban be  reah bek .
82|2|ning nowpel del php teanglay ban bak thleak khe  t ch khtei  .
82|3|ning nowpel del tukasamoutr trauv ban ke bamphtoh laeng  .
82|4|ning nowpel del phnaur teanglay trauv ban ke bamphosa laeng .
82|5|mnoussa mnea k nung ban doeng nouv avei del khluon ban sang kanlongomk  ning avei del khluon mintean sang .
82|6|ao mnoussa lok.  tae avei tow del ban baokabrasa anak aoyothveu  shi ri k champoh mcheasa robsa anak da thkomthkaeng
82|7|del ban bangkeut anak  ruoch thveu aoy anak mean roubreang penhlenh  promteang phdal aoy anak nouv lokkhan la samoromy
82|8|knong roubreang namuoy del trong mean chetnea  trong nung  bangkeut anak noh
82|9|min dauchnaoh te.  phtoytowvinh puok anak bercha bdeseth nung thngai  chomnoumchomreah( thngai barlok) towvinh .
82|10|haey pitabrakd nasa  puok anak ku mean anak tam khleameul ( mea la ai kat) .
82|11|chea anak thkomthkaeng  ning chea anak kttra( real ampeu robsa anak) .
82|12|puokke( mea la ai kat) doeng nouv avei del puok anak br pru td .
82|13|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del ban sang ampeula ku  sthet knong thansuokr na ai m .
82|14|haey pitabrakd nasa  puok del br pru td ampeuaeakrak  ku sthet knong nork cheu hi m .
82|15|puokke nung chaul tow knong thanonork noh now thngai chomnoumchomreah(thngai  barlok) .
82|16|haey puokke min ach kechvih pi vea ban laey .
82|17|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  thngai chomnoumchomreah chea avei noh
82|18|banteabmk  tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  thngai chomnoumchomreah chea avei  noh
82|19|kuchea thngai del kmean bokkol na mneak ach meanamnach avei chuoy  dl bokkol mneaktiet ban laey .  haey se ch kei  d sa me  r ch now thngai  noh kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh temuoyokt .
83|1|pheap vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del keibanlom .
83|2|chea puok del teamtear chngban krob chamnuon nowpel del puokke  thloeng veasa  ryy veal pi anakadtei .
83|3|te nowpel del puokke veasa ryy veal  ryy thloeng aoy anakadtei ku  puokke thveu aoy khveah .
83|4|tae puok teangnoh min kit tha  pitabrakd nasa  puokke nung  trauv ke thveu aoy rsa laengvinh
83|5|now thngai muoy da thomtheng( thngai barlok) te ryy
83|6|ku now thngai del mnoussa lok nung chhr nowchampohmoukh mcheasa  krobkrong piphp teangoasa .
83|7|min dauchnaoh te.  karpit banhchi robsa puok br pru td ampeuaeakrak  ku sthet knong sai chchi n .
83|8|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  sai chchi n chea avei noh
83|9|kuchea banhchi muoy del trauv ban ke kttra touk .
83|10|pheap vineasa a nd reay now thngai noh ku samreab puok del  bdeseth .
83|11|kuchea puok del bdeseth nung thngai chomnoumchomreah .
83|12|haey kmean anaknea mneak ach bdeseth nung vea krawpi puok  del bampean br pru td babakamm noh laey .
83|13|nowpel mean ke sautr ayeat  robsa yeung aoy ke sdab  ke bercha ban niyeay tha  nih kuchea rueng pe  r ng nitean towvinh .
83|14|te. phtoytowvinh  avei( babakamm) del puokke br pru td noh  ban krobadandab leu chetd robsa puokke .
83|15|te.  pitabrakd nasa  puokke nung trauv ke betbang pi kar  meulkheunh mcheasa robsa puokke now thngai noh( thngai barlok) .
83|16|kraoyomk  puokke pitchea nung trauv chaul nork cheu hi m .
83|17|kraoyomk tiet  mean ke niyeay tha  nih haey kuchea avei  del puok anak thleab bdeseth nung vea noh .
83|18|te.  pitabrakd nasa  banhchi robsa banda anak del sang ampeula  ku sthet knong ai lli you n .
83|19|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  ai lli you n chea avei noh
83|20|kuchea banhchi muoy del trauv ban ke kttra touk .
83|21|del banda mea la ai kat kampoungte thveusaeaksaei champoh banhchi noh .
83|22|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del sang ampeula  ku sthetnow  knong thansuokr na ai m .
83|23|daoy puokke angkouy now leu kre koyokn( vottho neanea) .
83|24|anak nung meulkheunh pheap sabbayrikreay now leu phtaimoukh  robsa puokke .
83|25|puokke nung trauv ke aoy ttuoltean sora da brisotth del trauv ban  bet chit .
83|26|klen robsa vea kraaub bamphot .  haey daembi ban dauchnih  chaur aoy  banda anak del brakuotabracheng  brakuotabracheng knea choh .
83|27|haey kar leay robsa vea ku ampi tuk nowknong thansuokr .
83|28|kuchea braphp tuk del banda anak mean than khpangkhpasa ttuol  tean vea .
83|29|pitabrakd nasa  puok del ban br pru td ampeuaeakrak(now  knong lokey)  puokke thleab saechchamak aoy banda anak del mean chomnue .
83|30|haey nowpel del puokke ban daerkat banda anak del  mean chomnue  puokke tengte samdeng kar chamakalakleuy .
83|31|haey nowpel del puokke tralb towkean baksaapuok robsa  ke vinh  ku puokke tralb daoy kar chamakdak anak mean chomnue .
83|32|haey nowpel del puokke bankheunh banda anak del  mean chomnue  puokke niyeay tha  pitabrakd nasa  puok teangnih cheapuok  del v nge  v ng .
83|33|haey puokke( puok kmean chomnue) min trauv ban ke chattang  chea anakakhleameul banda anak del mean chomnue laey .
83|34|dau che  neah  now thngainih( thngai barlok)  banda anak del mean  chomnue saechchamak champoh puok del kmean chomnue vinh .
83|35|puokke angkouy now leu kre koyokn( vottho neanea) .
83|36|tae puok kmean chomnue trauv ban ke tabasnang nouv avei del puokke  thleab ban br pru td der ryyte
